title: MD
biography: B. V. R. Mohan Reddy is an Indian business executive and engineering manager who founded and served as Executive Chairman of Cyient. He joined the DCM Group in 1974, and has subsequently worked with MICO Bosch, HCL, and OMC Computers Limited. He was the Chairman of NASSCOM from 2014–2015, and is a business analyst.
aiSummary: V. R. Reddy is a medicine specialist with an H-index of 50 at Radiation oncology (Member). Has been published in New England Journal of Medicine, Cell, Science. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
